1. How does your app address the issue or problem? -It helps parents be able to know wat their kids are doing throughout the day at de pre school1 \n \n 2. What solution does your app give? -Our App give access to parents to have an overall view of what their kids get up to during the day at the preschool and also give the teacher a glimpse in what the kids get up to when theyâ€™re at home. \n \n 3. If you have multiple goals, prioritize them. Which goals are more important?
- The teacher must be able to send kids work to parents - The parent must be able to upload the kids work so that the teacher can see what the kids is up to at home.
